title: Forbidden Archeology - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 2/3/21
itunes:title: Forbidden Archeology - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 2/3/21
description:
George Noory and author Michael Cremo discuss his research into archeological anomalies, and his controversial theory that artifacts he has uncovered prove that humans have existed on Earth for millions of years longer than conventional academic timelines.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
George Noory and author Michael Cremo discuss his research into archeological anomalies, and his controversial theory that artifacts he has uncovered prove that humans have existed on Earth for millions of years longer than conventional academic timelines.

itunes:summary: An exploration into the origins of mankind on Earth.
